data.text: "A mild-mannered programmer until he was flung into a vat of acid by the Bat Man, the Joker only has one thing on his mind: taking away all of the Bat Man's toys."

Anyway, DC: if you need someone to play the Joker and want to go the complete opposite direction you went with Suicide Squad, let me know. I'll be your doughy middle aged Joker with a smile sharper than an ax.
